file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 49-52-01-06 - APU COMPARTMENT COOLING AIR INTAKE - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL APU COMPARTMENT COOLING AIR INTAKE - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C11 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the inspection on the APU compartment cooling air intake. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH APU APU COMPARTMENT COOLING AIR IN- 49-52-01-200-801-A T-62T-40C11 TAKE - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 49-52-01 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-52-01-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C11 2. APU COMPARTMENT COOLING AIR INTAKE - INSPECTION A. General (1) Obey the instructions below to do the inspection on the APU compartment cooling air intake. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 313 APU Cowling C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the APU cowling 01 available E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task APU cowling H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the ladder below the APU cowling. I. Inspect APU Compartment Cooling Air Intake (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Do a visual inspection on the APU-compartment cooling-air intake for blockage. Repair or clean the APU compartment cooling air intake, as required. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the ladder.
